com.sonf.core.session

接口 IOSession<CH,CG extends IOConfig>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractIOSession, NioSession

    public interface IOSession<CH,CG extends IOConfig>

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cancelConnect(IOFuture future)
      Cancel the Connect-request associate with the specified ConnectFuture if the session is in SState.CONNECTING state.
      ICloseFuture closeNow()
      Closes this session immediately.
      ICloseFuture closeOnFlush()
      Closes this session after all queued write packets are flushed.
      IOFuture connect()
      Start a Connect-request to connect this session to it's remote address This method should be called only when the session is in SState.NEW state.
      boolean containsAttribute(java.lang.Object key) 
      java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.lang.Object key)
      Returns the value of the user-defined attribute of this session.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> getAttributeKeys() 
      CH getChannel()
      Get the channel associated with this session
      CG getConfig()
      Get the configuration of this session.
      IOController getController() 
      IWritePacket getCurrentWritePacket()
      Returns the IWritePacket which is being processed by IOProcessor.
      IFilterChain getFilterChain() 
      IFilterChainMatcher getFilterChainMatcher() 
      long getId() 
      int getIdleCount(IdleStatus status) 
      IoBuffer getReadIOBuffer() 
      java.lang.String getUniqueKey()
      Unique key is of form: ip:port
      java.util.Queue<IWritePacket> getWriteQueue()
      Get the queue that contains the message waiting for being written.
      boolean isActive() 
      boolean isClosing() 
      boolean isConnecting() 
      boolean isInvalid() 
      boolean isNew() 
      boolean isReady() 
      java.lang.Object removeAttribute(java.lang.Object key)
      Removes a user-defined attribute with the specified key.
      java.lang.Object setAttribute(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets a user-defined attribute.
      java.lang.Object setAttributeIfAbsent(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.Object value)
      Sets a user defined attribute if the attribute with the specified key is not set yet.
      void setChannel(CH channel)
      Set the channel associated with this session
      void setConfig(CG config)
      Set the configuration of this session.
      void setCurrentWritePacket(IWritePacket writePacket)
      Associate the current write request with the session
      void setFilterChainMatcher(IFilterChainMatcher filterChainMatcher)
      set a filter chain matcher only used in this session
      void setStateClosed()
      Set the session to SState.INVALID means the session channel closed
      void setStateReady()
      Set the session to SState.READY means the session channel connected ok and is ready for I/O operations.
      IWriteFuture write(java.lang.Object message)
      Writes the specified message to remote endpoint.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getId

        long getId()
        返回:
        a unique identifier for this session. Every session has its own ID which is different from each other.

      • setChannel

        void setChannel(CH channel)
        Set the channel associated with this session
        参数:
        channel -

      • getChannel

        CH getChannel()
        Get the channel associated with this session
        返回:
        channel

      • setConfig

        void setConfig(CG config)
        Set the configuration of this session.
        参数:
        config - the IOConfig

      • getConfig

        CG getConfig()
        Get the configuration of this session. Session's configuration will be applied only to this session itself.
        返回:
        the IOConfig of this session.

      • connect

        IOFuture connect()
        Start a Connect-request to connect this session to it's remote address This method should be called only when the session is in SState.NEW state.
        返回:
        the ConnectFuture of the Connect-request

      • cancelConnect

        void cancelConnect(IOFuture future)
        Cancel the Connect-request associate with the specified ConnectFuture if the session is in SState.CONNECTING state.
        参数:
        future - ConnectFuture of the Connect-request to be canceled

      • getUniqueKey

        java.lang.String getUniqueKey()
        Unique key is of form: ip:port
        返回:
        "ip:port " string or null if the remoteAddress has not been parsed successfully

      • setStateClosed

        void setStateClosed()
        Set the session to SState.INVALID means the session channel closed

      • setStateReady

        void setStateReady()
        Set the session to SState.READY means the session channel connected ok and is ready for I/O operations.

      • isReady

        boolean isReady()
        返回:
        whether this session is ready for I/O operations.

      • isConnecting

        boolean isConnecting()
        返回:
        whether this session is in connecting now

      • isClosing

        boolean isClosing()
        返回:
        whether this session is in closing now

      • isInvalid

        boolean isInvalid()
        返回:
        whether this session is closed already

      • isNew

        boolean isNew()
        返回:
        whether this session is a new one, you can use @link IOFuture connect()} method to start a connect-request

      • getIdleCount

        int getIdleCount(IdleStatus status)
        参数:
        status - IdleStatus
        返回:
        the count of the specified IdleStatus counter

      • getReadIOBuffer

        IoBuffer getReadIOBuffer()
        返回:
        the IoBuffer used to read data from the session channel

      • getController

        IOController getController()
        返回:
        the IOController which provides I/O service to this session.

      • getFilterChain

        IFilterChain getFilterChain()
        返回:
        the filter chain that only affects this session.

      • setFilterChainMatcher

        void setFilterChainMatcher(IFilterChainMatcher filterChainMatcher)
        set a filter chain matcher only used in this session

      • getFilterChainMatcher

        IFilterChainMatcher getFilterChainMatcher()
        返回:
        the filter chain matcher that only affects this session.

      • setAttribute

        java.lang.Object setAttribute(java.lang.Object key,
                              java.lang.Object value)
        Sets a user-defined attribute.
        参数:
        key - the key of the attribute
        value - the value of the attribute
        返回:
        The old value of the attribute. null if it is new.

      • getAttribute

        java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.lang.Object key)
        Returns the value of the user-defined attribute of this session.
        参数:
        key - the key of the attribute
        返回:
        null if there is no attribute with the specified key

      • setAttributeIfAbsent

        java.lang.Object setAttributeIfAbsent(java.lang.Object key,
                                      java.lang.Object value)
        Sets a user defined attribute if the attribute with the specified key is not set yet.
        参数:
        key - The key of the attribute we want to set
        value - The value we want to set
        返回:
        The old value of the attribute. null if not found.

      • removeAttribute

        java.lang.Object removeAttribute(java.lang.Object key)
        Removes a user-defined attribute with the specified key.
        参数:
        key - The key of the attribute we want to remove
        返回:
        The old value of the attribute. null if not found.

      • containsAttribute

        boolean containsAttribute(java.lang.Object key)
        参数:
        key - The key of the attribute we are looking for in the session
        返回:
        true if this session contains the attribute with the specified key.

      • getAttributeKeys

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> getAttributeKeys()
        返回:
        the set of keys of all user-defined attributes.

      • closeNow

        ICloseFuture closeNow()
        Closes this session immediately. This operation is asynchronous, it returns a ICloseFuture.
        返回:
        The ICloseFuture that can be use to wait for the completion of this operation

      • closeOnFlush

        ICloseFuture closeOnFlush()
        Closes this session after all queued write packets are flushed. This operation is asynchronous. Wait for the returned ICloseFuture if you want to wait for the session actually closed.
        返回:
        The associated ICloseFuture

      • write

        IWriteFuture write(java.lang.Object message)
        Writes the specified message to remote endpoint. This operation is asynchronous; IOHandler.messageSent(IOSession,Object) will be invoked when the message is actually sent. You can also wait for the returned IWriteFuture if you want to wait for the message actually written.
        参数:
        message - The message to write. Note that the message of IoBuffer class will be considered as a raw data and sent directly, all IFilter encoders on the session's FilterChain will be ignored.
        返回:
        The associated WriteFuture

      • getWriteQueue

        java.util.Queue<IWritePacket> getWriteQueue()
        Get the queue that contains the message waiting for being written.
        返回:
        The queue containing the pending messages.

      • getCurrentWritePacket

        IWritePacket getCurrentWritePacket()
        Returns the IWritePacket which is being processed by IOProcessor.
        返回:
        null if and if only no message is being written

      • setCurrentWritePacket

        void setCurrentWritePacket(IWritePacket writePacket)
        Associate the current write request with the session
        参数:
        writePacket - the current write packet

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        返回:
        a value of whether or not this service is active
